title: Futura-like font
author: andres_w

comments.content:
The closest I have at the moment is [Aperçu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072726/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/apercu/about-font). Can't remember where I've seen this /S... Still searching...

EDIT: got it. Scratch Aperçu, it's [Simon Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072726/http:/tendollarfonts.com/products/simon-sans) by Nathaniel Winter-Hébert.
